title: Sketchbook Folio, "Studies after Four Statues on the Tomb of Julius II, after Michelangelo: Moses; Madonna and Child; Leah, Virtue; Rachel, Religion", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center left: MICHELANGELO ROMA; at center right on plinth: BONAROTI ROMA; at lower left: 28/ Bonaroti Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Studies after Four Statues on the Tomb of Julius II, after Michelangelo: Moses; Madonna and Child; Leah, Virtue; Rachel, Religion", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3571-a/d.
